    [Image] or [Truncated image[            Bcol      Ecol
L1
    [var]                                   1         4
    [a]                                     5         6
    [=]                                     7         8
    ["a"]                                   9         12

    [var]                                   1         4
    [b]                                     5         6
    [=]                                     7         8

L4
    [var]                                   1         4
    [x]                                     5         6
    [=]                                     7         8
    ["$a(b: $b, c: \\"$c\\")"]              9         31
EOF
